title: Sri Lakshmi Narayana Perumal
sloganFirst: Narayanaya vidmahe vasu devaya dimahi tanno vishnu prasodaya.
sloganSecond:
Kulam tharum selvam thandhidum Adiyaar paduthuyar aayinavellaam
Nilandharam seyyum neel visumbarulum Arulodu perinilam alikkum
Valam tharum mattrum thandhidum Petra thaayinum aayina seyyum
Nalam tharum sollai naan kandukondaen Narayana ennum naamam
- Thirumangai Alvar
timelineNov2023h1: Thiru Kalyana vaibavam & 48th day Mandala Abhishekam Completion Ceremony
timelineNov2023p: Lakshmi Narayana Perumal graces 48 days Mandala Abhishekam and Thiru Kalyana vaibavam nicely done.
timelineSep2023p: Om Namo Narayanaya! On 17th September 2023 Ashtabandana Maha Kumbabhishegam Kudamuzku Nannieratu festival was held in a pleasant manner with Maha Mandabam and Artha Mandabam.
timelineOct2022p: Full details description with main content
timelineJun2013p: Sri Lakshmi Narayana Perumal new temple building constructed and Maha Kumbabhishegam Kudamuzhuku Nannieratu festival was held in a pleasant manner.
